quote_first: It happened to be the case that the sixty-based system coincided with our our current method of keeping time… Apparently they wanted us to know that that something might happen at
quote_last: on a day yet to be specified.
title: Ratner's Star
author: Don DeLillo

quote_last: “The hypersonic test flight must proceed as scheduled,” Tanzan Mino said quietly. “Now that all the financial arrangements have been completed, the Coordinating Committee of the LDP has agreed to bring the treaty before the Diet next week. A delay is unthinkable.”
title: Project Daedalus
author: Thomas Hoover
